entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0058 triggers on expressions with 'out' params #76477
  • Visual Studio 2022 v17.12 breaks binding to [ObservableProperty] #76470
  • Recommend preprocessing symbols that have already been typed out in the document #76469
  • Unable to load analyzer assembly when targeting ARM64 #76467

Closed

  • rename operation corrupts unrelated source code #76439
  • Extract Method on part of an expression generates invalid code #38087
    18.0
  • Revisit error handling for TaskExtensions.SafeContinueWith #47891
    Backlog
  • Remove SafeContinueWith helpers #44150
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35616.137 #76472
  • The warning about `yield return` in lock statements (CS9237) is documented in reference but not implemented. #76442
  • Remove type-forwarders added to avoid breaking TypeScript #43313
  • After entering the method, the parenthesis Automatically outputs the parentheses after entering a method #55085
  • the flag (tag? dont know the name) regarding inheritance is misleading #58992
  • Compiler error when compiling generator with `allow ref struct` type param #76456
    17.14

PullRequests

Created

  • Update telemetry to 17.13.28 #76480
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove usage of WaitAndGetResult from debugger paths #76479
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove usages of WaitAndGetResult from object browser. #76478
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Propagate marked attributes from primary constructor parameters to backing fields. #76475
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove TaskQueue and SafeContinueWith extensions #76459
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix parsing of for-loops #76476
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Call Enter/LeaveRegion APIs for binary expressions #76412
    Area-Compilers, VSCode, Next
  • Remove usages of TaskQueue from interactive component #76455
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2602943 #76454
    auto-merge
  • Remove usage of task extension in rename tracking #76463
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove Task Queue from unit teseting layer #76457
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Remove usage of WaitAndGetResult #76474
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Move to simpler task patterns. #76448
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Update PublishData.json to add new branch #76471
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Remove usage of task extension in rename tracking #76462
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify model computation threading #76461
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • remove synchronous blocking waits in async codepaths #76465
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Delete task extension used only by the interactive window. #76450
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Remove Edgio CDN usage #76466
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Remove use of WaitAndGetResult #76464
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Calculate the hash code in an unchecked block #76460
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Move Default VB Version to 17.13 #76452
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to release/dev17.13 #76458
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Do not report conflicting types errors for source-generated APIs #71546
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Warn for redundant pattern in `not ... or <redundant>` pattern #75581
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Dictionary expressions: initial binding and lowering support #76257
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Add option for choosing stdio as the LSP communication channel #76437
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add spec for the data section string literals feature #76139
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Feature - String Literals in Data Section as UTF8
